title: [Control systems] ABB security advisory (AV25-290)
description: On May 22, 2025, ABB published a security advisory to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: ASPECT-Enterprise ASP-ENT-x model  version 3.08.03 and prior
NEXUS Series NEX-2x and NEXUS-3-x model  version 3.08.03 and prior
MATRIX Series MAT-x model  version 3.08.03 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
